name: Monday Night Minin'
description:
Welcome to Monday Night Minin', the best ripoff of Friday Night Funkin' AND Minecraft that you'll ever play!

First thing's first: This is NOT a mod for Friday Night Funkin'. It was meant to be a programming exercise for me, so the game was built from the ground up. 

=========================================================

In this game, you go up against famous characters from the Minecraft Universe in a beat-based battle of the blocks! Just like most rhythm games, you have to press the right key at the right moment. But instead of BORING arrows, you get to use EPIC Minecraft ores instead!

Monday Night Minin' currently features 5 characters: Steve, Alex, CosmicCrowMC, Dream, and Herobrine, each with their own song and location. Don't know who that third one is? Take a wild guess. Anywho, I may add more characters in the future, I may not. We'll just have to see if people like this game or not. (I'm erring towards the latter...)

The difficulty of this game varies wildly, so there's something for players of every skill level in here. You can also customize your keybinds to your liking, and even play with someone else on the same keyboard! (Or control two players by yourself just to flex.)

This game was programmed with Processing for Java. Music, art, charting, and animations were all done by me. I'm just that talented. I'm pretty humble, too.

If you like this game, you're awesome. Awesome people also like my other game called "Enter The Backrooms", which you can find on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511670/Enter_The_Backrooms/

If you like what I do or just want to add another person to your mile-long subscription list on YouTube, check out my channel CosmicCrowMC Gaming, where I upload update videos and... other... things. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8DJV4pfPswdcjc8IWbJ-5A

=========================================================

Known Issues:

- Discord is DUMB and STINKY and doesn't like streaming the game. BEFORE you try streaming this on Discord, make sure you go to User Settings > Voice and Video > Find the switch that says "Use our latest technology to capture your screen" and turn that OFF. I dunno what that "latest technology" is but it just can't handle the sheer epicness of Monday Night Minin'.

- Streaming on Discord will sometimes make the video lag behind the audio. Discord just has all sorts of problems, doesn't it? Or is it me? Nah, I'm a perfect specimen. It's Discord.
